text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires describing at least three enforcement mechanisms. The candidate answer explicitly lists and describes five distinct enforcement mechanisms under the section 'Enforcement Mechanisms That Strengthen Compliance': 1. Financial Penalties (fines), 2. Audits and Oversight (mandatory audits, checks), 3. Public Shaming and Market Pressure (name-and-shame registries), 4. Criminal/Reputational Escalation (private right of action/damages), and 5. Complementary Tools (union bargaining/tech integration). This clearly satisfies the requirement of describing at least three mechanisms.", "criterion_id": "12b6750b-2ee2-4775-ab21-303102470faf"}
